text: Martyrialized is the second studio album by the Portuguese death metal band Malevolence. This album was recorded at Studio Fredman, and mixed by Fredrik Nordström. ==Track listing== # "The Brotherhood of Christ" – 3:19 # "Diabolical Eve (Chronicles of Mother Lusitania)" – 2:52 # "Hunters of the Red Moon" – 3:31 # "Les Salles Obscure De Rose Noire XVIII" – 3:36 # "Thy Extremist Operetta (Instrumental)" – 4:11 # "Insubordination" – 2:37 # "A Shining Onslaught of Tyranny" – 4:02 # "Oceans of Fire" – 3:21 # "Martyrialized" – 3:03 ==Credits== *Carlos Cariano – Rhythm guitar/Vocals *Fred Nöel – Lead guitar *Aires Pereira – Bass *Gustavo Costa – Drums *Paulo Pereira – Keyboards *Fredrik Nordström – Producer Category:1999 albums Category:Malevolence (band) albums
title: Martyrialized
